sentences.en: Alex didn't read fluently till he was nearly seven.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯快到7岁时才能流利地阅读。

sentences.en: He boasted that he could speak six languages fluently.
sentences.cn: 他自夸自己能流利地讲6种语言.

sentences.en: He can recite the poem fluently.
sentences.cn: 他把那首诗念得琅琅上口.

sentences.en: He could speak English as fluently as an Englishman.
sentences.cn: 他说英语和英国人一样流利.

sentences.en: He has some acquaintance with German, but doesn't speak it fluently.
sentences.cn: 他略懂一点德语, 但说得不流利.
他可以流利地说3种语言。

sentences.en: He talked fluently about " the necessity for every man to get on ".
sentences.cn: 他却仍在滔滔不绝地讲述着, “ 每个人都必须奋发向前 ”.

sentences.en: I can't speak English fluently as I am out of practice.
sentences.cn: 我不能流利地说英语,因为我已荒疏了.

sentences.en: In this way we train them to read fluently and accurately.
sentences.cn: 我们用这样的方法来训练他们流利准确地阅读.

sentences.en: It is quite unthinkable that a child like him can speak a foreign language so fluently.
sentences.cn: 像他这样的孩子居然能流利地说一种外语,真是令人难以置信.

sentences.en: She not only speaks French fluently, but also writes it well.
sentences.cn: 她的法语不仅讲得很流利, 写得也很好.

sentences.en: Speaking the language fluently certainly smoothed our path.
sentences.cn: 我们说这种语言很流利,确实给我们带来了许多方便.

sentences.en: We should train our students to speak English fluently and accurately.
sentences.cn: 我们应培养学生流利而准确地讲英语。

sentences.en: Within one year she could speak it fluently and with almost no accent.
sentences.cn: 一年里小宋就能说流利的上海话了，而且几乎没有湖南口音。

words.tran_cn: 流畅的，流利的；液态的；畅流的
